backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence fixes for Hero component scroll buttons (Explore Our Products and Our Story) targeting REQ-42 and REQ-43.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the Raavni Agrobyte/Milletmist website components, styling, and structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme CSS variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Milletmist website that loads the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that assembles Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, and Footer sections with proper IDs for navigation.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component showcasing Raavni Agrobyte's women-led mission, company story with team image, and four value cards highlighting empowerment, quality, social impact, and natural goodness.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying three info cards with address in Virar Maharashtra, email addresses, and phone number with proper mailto/tel links.
frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx: Core Team section displaying four team member profile cards with images, names, roles, descriptions, and LinkedIn button placeholders in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/FarmerSupport.ts: Farmer support section explaining Milletmist's ultra-poor farmer partnerships with farmer image and four impact cards covering direct partnership, sustainable income, training, and community building.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Raavni Agrobyte branding, copyright information, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with dynamic app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with background image, logo, headline, feature pills (Natural Millets, Women-Led, Farmer Support), and CTA buttons for scrolling to products and about sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menu, scroll-based styling, and smooth scrolling to sections (home, about, team, products, farmer-support, contact) with active section highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section displaying two millet-based products (Protein Bar and Energy Boost) with images, descriptions, benefits badges, and a list of general millet health benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication support, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks to interact with backend; currently empty with no implemented queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using warm earth tones (terracotta primary, sage secondary, amber accent), dark mode support, custom gradients, and typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space, typography (Inter/Playfair Display fonts), border radius variables, custom shadows, and animations for accordions and fade-in effects.
project_state.json: Project metadata for Raavni Agrobyte/Milletmist website tracking 9 implemented features (hero, about, products, farmer support, team sections, navigation, contact form, footer) with known issues including non-functional hero buttons and missing footer logo.
